$ java -jar \ com.io7m.scando.cmdline-0.0.1-main.jar \ --oldJar io7m-jtensors-core-7.1.0.jar \ --newJar com.io7m.jtensors.core-9.0.0.jar \ --oldJarVersion 7.1.0 \ --newJarVersion 7.2.0 \ --textReport report.txt \ --htmlReport report.html INFO: Text report written to report.txt INFO: HTML report written to report.html ERROR: Version change between 7.1.0 and 7.2.0 is MINOR, but the changes made to code require a MAJOR version change
$ echo $? 1
